wikis
AboutBurnout Modding Wiki - Homepage

Useful tools, documentation and more to assist fellow modders.

Per-car statistics and IDs for Burnout 3, Legends, Revenge and Paradise

All debug strings from Revenge Alpha 7 (0714) build’s ELF file

Burnout Revenge unpacked PS2/Xbox demo builds, collected by Edness

Burnout Legends ENVIRO.DAT settings (some of these might line up with Dom PSP’s enviros as well, but that hasn’t yet been confirmed, so YMMV)

Console Texture Explorer, a tool that can be used to find, view and export textures on Burnout’s PS2 and PSP versions

KabutoKun’s Texture Converter v0.8 (converts textures in the STATIC.DAT file of each track to PNG, currently only supports the PS2 games)
